ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveDateRange with data type Time Interval
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Contains zero or one [0..1] maximumQuantity with data type Physical Quantity
Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Contains zero or one [0..1] orderablePharmacyItem, where its type is Orderable Pharmacy Item
